articles.title: Asteroid which caused dinosaur extinction crashed in this spot on Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: Dinosaurs, which roamed the Earth millions of years ago. were wiped out because an asteroid crashed on Earth. Now, scientists have located the place of impact of the asteroid, which caused an extinction-level event. Read on to find out where it is located.
